name: Write.Write.Push!
description:
Write.Write.Push!

Become a writer who fights with his angry neighbors using a trap in the floor.

What you get:

- good game for streaming (if you like to cry on a camera after each fail);

- 30 minutes of hard gameplay;

- tired fingers; 

- weird story like in «Naked Lunch» (1991, film);

- 4 awesome levels and 1 cruel epilogue.


Who made this:

Danil Svechkov (idea, graphics, story, programming);

Hedgehogus;Project (music);

Aleksei Sigabatulin (english translation).
